text: Kantilal Ranchhodji Desai (27 January 1932 - 23 July 2016) was an Indian cricketer. He played nineteen first-class cricket matches for Gujarat between 1959 and 1966. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Indian cricketers Category:Gujarat cricketers Category:Cricketers from Surat
title: Kantilal Ranchhodji Desai
